Network

Do you want to send us a proposal? We are always open to new ideas, suggestions and proposals. Get in touch with us if you want to collaborate on a specific project.

Data journalism

Are you a developer, a data journalist or a data visualization expert? Contact us if you are interested in getting involved in our activities. You can also check our github repository.

Make a donation

We are a non-profit organization. Get in touch with us if you are interested in making a donation.
